channel.title: Blast on Zhaoyu Li
channel.description: Recent content in Blast on Zhaoyu Li

item.title: Some Notes about BLAST+
item.description: Table of Contents Make BLAST Database blastp HSP Output Explanation Parse Result Using Python References Make BLAST Database Basic command: makeblastdb -in all_fasta.fasta -dbtype prot -parse_seqids -out mydb Parameter: in: the sequences file dbtype: type of database out: output db name blastp Compare protein sequence to protein database. blastp -query seq.fasta -out seq.blast -db dbname -outfmt 6 -evalue 1e-5 -num_threads 8 Parameter:
